name: Synchronize
desc: If another Pokemon burns, paralyzes, poisons, or badly poisons this Pokemon, that Pokemon receives the same non-volatile status condition.
shortDesc: If another Pokemon burns/poisons/paralyzes this Pokemon, it also gets that status.

flavorText.sv: If the Pokémon is burned, paralyzed, or poisoned by another Pokémon, that Pokémon will be inflicted with the same status condition.
